description: Replacement tooth root (titanium) surgically placed to support crowns â€” long-term solution for missing teeth.
Treatment for a tooth with cracks; options include bonding, crowns, root canal or extraction depending on severity.
Assessment and surgical extraction of third molars (wisdom teeth) when impacted or causing problems.
In-office or take-home bleaching to safely lighten tooth color and remove stains.
Thin porcelain or composite shells bonded to front teeth to improve shape, color or alignment.
Braces or clear aligners to correct misaligned teeth and bite issues for improved function and aesthetics.
3D imaging (CBCT) for implant planning, surgical assessment, and complex diagnostics.
Removable full-arch dentures to replace all upper or lower teeth for function and appearance.
